examples: it is odd that his name is never mentioned

definitions.text: an indefinite quantity more than that specified
beyond or deviating from the usual or expected
examples: her speech has a funny twang
they have some funny ideas about war
the peculiar aromatic odor of cloves
something definitely queer about this town

definitions.text: of the remaining member of a pair, of socks e.g.

examples: she had a little money left over so she went to a movie
saved the remaining sandwiches for supper
